generalTerms.title: Shipping Times
generalTerms.content: All orders take between 3-7 business days. If you have not received your order within 7 business days, please contact us at

useLicense.title: Order Processing:
useLicense.content: Orders are processed and dispatched within 1-2 business days of confirmation and take an additional 3-7 days to reach the customer.

disclaimer.title: Shipping Methods
disclaimer.content: We utilise reliable carriers to ensure timely and secure delivery.

paymentsAndRefunds.title: Shipping Locations
paymentsAndRefunds.content:
We offer shipping to various destinations, both domestically and internationally.
We ship to all parts of the UK.
We ship to all parts of the Netherlands.

services.title: Tracking Information
services.content: Tracking details will be provided once the order is dispatched.

additionalInfo.title: Shipping Costs
additionalInfo.content: Shipping costs, inclusive of purchase unless stated otherwise, are calculated based on the destination and weight of the package.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding shipping, please contact us at
